logicalComponents
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  logicalComponents.Controller

public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

This is the bondary class which interfaces with the GUI and acts as a bridge to all of the data of the logical Hand. It contains methods that are tailored to specific tasks which came up through the GUI. This class also contains a class which implements SerialPortEventListener, and manages serial port data flow and updating the joint positions.

Author:
dmac

Nested Class Summary
 class Controller.SerialIO
          This class is what is used for receiving notifications from the serial port for incoming data, and also manages output to the serial port based on the state of certain flags.
